review: I also received this for $19 dollars as an early adopter. It works pretty well, I am overall happy with it...I guess. But there are some drawbacks.PROS:AMAZON MUSIC/PRIME MUSIC ON YOUR TV OR HOME AUDIO SYSTEM- This is the biggest perk for me. My music can be added/bought via Amazon, then played on any television's audio setup via HDMI.AMAZON INSTANT VIDEO ON YOUR TV- Many shows and movies are free from the stick, and the ones that aren't are relatively inexpensive.FREE CLOUD STORAGE WITH AMAZON PRIME- You get like 10GB a month with a basic membership, which, in all honesty, is really not enough. That's like 2 short movies. But something like an extra $60/year ($5/month) gets you unlimited.CONS:SMALL INTERNAL STORAGE- It only has 32GB internal storage. All data is STORED in the cloud, but is transferred to the stick 32GB at a time. So the first couple of days you're like, "This is great!" Then there starts to be lagging and juttering in your music and movies as old data is purged and new data is written ALL OF THE TIME! It DOES have an option available to clear the cache at any time, but it's very arduous to do the process all the time.GAMES ARE WACK- If you only have the remote, you can't even play most games. If you blow an extra $39.99-59.99 on a controller, your treated to dollar-store rip-offs of famous games.
